meanings.definition: The action or process of depriving a person or group of human qualities, rights, or dignity.
meanings.sent1: The dehumanization of the prisoners in the movie was truly heartbreaking.
meanings.sent2: The dehumanization of the workers in that factory is unacceptable.
meanings.sent3: The dehumanization of the robot in the comedy show made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dehumanization of nature in the industrial age is a sad reality.
meanings.sent5: The dehumanization of the characters in the novel made the story more intense.
